conditions.name: On click
conditions.description: Triggered when a mouse button clicked or double-clicked.

params.name: Mouse button
params.description: Select the mouse button to check.

params.name: Click type
params.description: Select which kind of click to check for.

conditions.name: On any click
conditions.description: Triggered when any mouse button clicked or double-clicked.

conditions.name: Mouse button is down
conditions.description: Test if a mouse button is currently held down.

params.name: Mouse button
params.description: Select the mouse button to check.

conditions.name: On button released
conditions.description: Triggered when a mouse button released.

params.name: Mouse button
params.description: Select the mouse button to check.

conditions.name: On object clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when a mouse button clicked or double-clicked on an object.

params.name: Mouse button
params.description: Select the mouse button to check.

params.name: Click type
params.description: Select which kind of click to check for.

params.name: Object clicked
params.description: Choose the object to check for a click on.

conditions.name: Cursor is over object
conditions.description: Check if the mouse cursor is over an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check for mouse over.

conditions.name: On mouse wheel
conditions.description: Triggered when the mouse wheel is scrolled.

params.name: Direction
params.description: Select which direction to detect the mouse wheel scrolling.

conditions.name: On pointer locked
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request pointer lock' if the pointer was successfully locked.

conditions.name: On pointer unlocked
conditions.description: Triggered after 'On pointer locked' when the pointer is unlocked.

conditions.name: On pointer lock error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs with pointer lock.

conditions.name: Has pointer lock
conditions.description: True if the pointer is currently locked.

conditions.name: On movement
conditions.description: Triggered every time the mouse moves. Note this also works without pointer lock.

actions.name: Set cursor from sprite
actions.description: Set the mouse cursor to the same image used by a Sprite.

params.name: Sprite
params.description: Choose a Sprite object to use as the cursor image.

actions.name: Request pointer lock
actions.description: Request to lock the mouse pointer in order to use it for camera control. Usually this only works in a user input trigger.

params.name: Unadjusted movement
params.description: Check to disable the system-level adjustment for mouse acceleration, and access raw mouse input instead.

actions.name: Release pointer lock
actions.description: Release any active pointer lock, restoring normal mouse pointer behavior.

actions.name: Set cursor style
actions.description: Change the style of the mouse cursor.

params.name: Cursor style
params.description: Choose the cursor style to set.

expressions.name: X
expressions.description: Get the mouse cursor X co-ordinate in the layout.

expressions.name: Y
expressions.description: Get the mouse cursor Y co-ordinate in the layout.

expressions.name: AbsoluteX
expressions.description: Get the mouse cursor X co-ordinate on the canvas.

expressions.name: AbsoluteY
expressions.description: Get the mouse cursor Y co-ordinate on the canvas.

expressions.name: MovementX
expressions.description: Get the horizontal movement when using pointer lock.

expressions.name: MovementY
expressions.description: Get the vertical movement when using pointer lock.

expressions.name: WheelDeltaX
expressions.description: Get the X change in a mouse wheel trigger.

expressions.name: WheelDeltaY
expressions.description: Get the Y change in a mouse wheel trigger.

expressions.name: WheelDeltaZ
expressions.description: Get the Z change in a mouse wheel trigger.
